title: The Tired Legs
visual_prompt: Dora-style cartoon: Ms. Garcia sitting with legs elevated, visible bulging varicose veins on legs shown as twisted blue-purple lines under skin, rubbing calves with tired expression

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: My legs ache terribly by end of day - I'm a teacher and stand all day.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Tell me about these veins - how long have they been there?

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: Years! But the pain and swelling are getting worse.

title: Understanding Venous Valves
visual_prompt: 3D model of leg showing veins with valves, Camilo pointing to normal valve (showing leaflets closed, blood flowing UP with GREEN arrow) vs broken valve (leaflets don't close, blood flowing DOWN with RED arrow)

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Veins have one-way valves to push blood UP to the heart.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: When valves fail, blood flows BACKWARD and pools!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: That causes veins to swell and twist - varicose veins!

title: The Duplex Ultrasound
visual_prompt: Camila performing venous duplex scan on Ms. Garcia's leg, ultrasound screen showing vein with color flow (RED indicating reflux/backward flow), probe on leg with gel

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: This ultrasound shows blood flow direction in real-time.

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: What do you see?

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Significant reflux in your saphenous vein - blood flowing backward!

title: The CEAP Classification
visual_prompt: Chart showing CEAP stages C0-C6 with illustrations: C0 (normal), C1 (spider veins), C2 (varicose veins), C3 (swelling), C4 (skin changes), C5 (healed ulcer), C6 (active ulcer). Ms. Garcia at C3

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: We grade venous disease from C0 to C6.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: You're C3 - varicose veins with swelling.

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: What are the treatment options?

title: Treatment Options Explained
visual_prompt: Pamphlet showing three treatment tiers: 1) Compression stockings (drawing of leg in stocking), 2) Endovenous ablation (laser in vein), 3) Phlebectomy (vein removal). Each with pros/cons list

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: We start conservative: compression stockings and elevation.

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: If symptoms persist, endovenous laser ablation closes the bad vein!

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: And phlebectomy removes the bulging branches.

title: The Laser Ablation Procedure
visual_prompt: Ms. Garcia lying on table, local anesthesia needle near groin, ultrasound-guided catheter insertion into saphenous vein shown on screen, laser fiber inside catheter glowing RED, team monitoring

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: We insert a laser fiber into the vein under ultrasound guidance.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: The laser heats and seals the vein shut!

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: Will I feel anything?

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Just local anesthesia - you'll be awake and walk out today!

title: Immediate Results
visual_prompt: Ms. Garcia standing wearing compression stocking, incision site marked with small bandaid, walking without pain, surprised happy expression, team smiling

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: I can't believe I'm walking already! And the heaviness is gone!

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: The bad vein is sealed - blood reroutes through healthy veins.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: Wear compression stockings for 2 weeks and you'll be back to teaching!

title: Back to Teaching
visual_prompt: Ms. Garcia teaching at whiteboard, standing confidently, legs visible with no more bulging veins (smooth skin), students at desks, bright classroom, Ms. Garcia smiling

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: I can stand all day without pain! No more aching legs!

dialogue.speaker: Student
dialogue.text: Ms. Garcia, you seem so energetic today!

dialogue.speaker: Ms. Garcia
dialogue.text: I got my vein treatment - best decision ever! Now, who knows the answer?
